PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-12872011-11-07,  ,  DFAIT,  ,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectConvention concerning Long-Range Transboundary Air Pollution on Persistent Organic Pollutants
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to take the actions necessary to accept on behalf of Canada the amendents to ANNEXES V AND VII OF THE PROTOCOL TO THE 1979 CONVENTION ON LONG-RANGE TRANSBOUNDARY AIR POLLUTION ON PERSISTENT ORGANIC POLLUTANTS, adopted at Geneva on December 18, 2009.
AttachmentsAttachment
